entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a professor at Hogwarts school. He is mentioned as having a conversation with Dumbledore before the start of term.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts school. He is mentioned as having a conversation with Snape before the start of term.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is a person who is suspected to have entered the school without inside help.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a student at Hogwarts school. He is mentioned as being rapt with attention during the conversation between Snape and Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Snape and Dumbledore had a conversation before the start of term, where Snape expressed his concerns about Black entering the school without inside help.
Black is suspected to have entered the school without inside help, as mentioned by Snape during the conversation with Dumbledore.
